ipDeptAgent.name: IP Dept Agent
ipDeptAgent.ability:
Deploy: Place 2 Stun tokens on a card with your Exploit token.
Commit (requires Support): Discard a card from an opponent's hand that is revealed to you.
ipDeptAgent.flavorText: - "You've violated copyright. Open the door. We have a search warrant."

tacticalAgent.name: Tactical Agent
tacticalAgent.ability:
Deploy: Place an Aim token on a card with your Threat.
Setup: Destroy a card with your Aim token.

patrolAgent.name: Patrol Agent
patrolAgent.ability:
Setup: Move to an empty cell in its line.
Commit: Place a Stun token on an adjacent opponent card with your Threat.
patrolAgent.flavorText: They say the city never sleeps. We make sure it doesn't even blink.

riotAgent.name: Riot Agent
riotAgent.ability:
Deploy: Push an adjacent opponent card 1 cell; you may move into its former cell.
Commit: Place a Stun token on an adjacent opponent card with your Threat.
riotAgent.flavorText: - "Citizens, disperse! This meeting is unauthorized by SynchroTech."

threatAnalyst.name: Threat Analyst
threatAnalyst.ability:
Deploy: Place an Exploit token on any card.
Commit (requires Support): Reveal 1 card from an opponent's hand for each of your Exploit tokens on the battlefield.

mrPearlDoF.name: Mr. Pearl, Director of BioSynch
mrPearlDoF.ability:
Pass: Your other units in lines get +1 power.
Deploy: Search your deck for a unit card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
mrPearlDoF.flavorText: Efficiency is the only metric that matters.

recklessProvocateur.name: Reckless Provocateur
recklessProvocateur.ability:
Deploy: Swap places with an adjacent card.
Commit: Move all tokens from a chosen allied card onto this card.
recklessProvocateur.flavorText: - "Patience is a weapon. Vengeance is an art."

dataLiberator.name: Data Liberator
dataLiberator.ability:
Pass: Cards with your Exploit tokens score points for you.
Deploy: Place an Exploit token on any card.
dataLiberator.flavorText: - "Information doesn't want to be free. It needs to be."

cautiousAvenger.name: Cautious Avenger
cautiousAvenger.ability:
Deploy: Place an Aim token on a card within 2 cells.
Setup (requires Support): Destroy a card with your Aim token.
cautiousAvenger.flavorText: - "Patience is a weapon. Vengeance is an art."

vigilantSpotter.name: Vigilant Spotter
vigilantSpotter.ability:
Support ⇒ Pass: When a revealed card of the opponent enters the battlefield, gain 2 points.
Commit: Reveal 1 card from an opponent's hand.
vigilantSpotter.flavorText: - "Patience is a weapon. Vengeance is an art."

inventiveMaker.name: Inventive Maker
inventiveMaker.ability:
Deploy: Create a Recon Drone token in an adjacent empty cell.
Setup (requires Support): Return a Device card from your discard pile to your hand.
inventiveMaker.flavorText: - "Patience is a weapon. Vengeance is an art."

finnMW.name: Finn, Most Wanted
finnMW.ability:
Setup: Move any one of your cards 1 or 2 cells.
Commit: Gain 1 point for each card that is revealed to you in opponents' hands or on the battlefield.
finnMW.flavorText: Catch me if you can. Spoiler: You can't.

faber.name: Faber
faber.ability: Deploy: Discard 1 card from your hand ⇒ Create a Walking Turret token in an adjacent empty cell.
faber.flavorText: In the gilded halls of the Optimates, even the tools of war are works of art.

censor.name: Censor
censor.ability:
Deploy: Place an Exploit token on any card.
Commit (requires Support): Replace your Exploit token on a card with a Stun token.
censor.flavorText: In the gilded halls of the Optimates, even the tools of war are works of art.

princeps.name: Princeps
princeps.ability:
Deploy: Gain a Shield token. Place an Aim token on a card in its line.
Setup: Destroy a card with your Aim token.
princeps.flavorText: Order is not requested. It is imposed.

immunis.name: Immunis
immunis.ability:
Deploy (requires Support): Return an Optimates card from your discard pile to an adjacent empty cell with a Resurrection token.
At the end of the phase, replace that Resurrection token with 2 Stun tokens.
immunis.flavorText: In the gilded halls of the Optimates, even the tools of war are works of art.

centurion.name: Centurion
centurion.ability: Commit: Sacrifice an allied unit ⇒ All allied cards in that unit's lines get +1 power.
centurion.flavorText: In the gilded halls of the Optimates, even the tools of war are works of art.

luciusTheImmortal.name: Lucius, The Immortal
luciusTheImmortal.ability:
Pass: Immunity to Stun. If exited from discard, gets +2 power.
Setup: Discard a card ⇒ Find a command card in your deck. Put it into your hand and shuffle.
luciusTheImmortal.flavorText: Death implies a cessation of function. I have simply optimized it.

codeKeeper.name: Code Keeper
codeKeeper.ability:
Deploy: Place 1 Exploit token on each opponent card in lines with any Threat.
Commit (requires Support): Move an opponent card with your Exploit token 1 cell.
codeKeeper.flavorText: The Signal is truth. All else is noise.

devoutSynthetic.name: Devout Synthetic
devoutSynthetic.ability:
Deploy: Push an adjacent opponent card 1 cell; you may move into its former cell.
Setup: Destroy an adjacent opponent card with a Threat or Stun token.
devoutSynthetic.flavorText: Flesh is a bug. The Signal is the patch.

unwaveringIntegrator.name: Unwavering Integrator
unwaveringIntegrator.ability:
Deploy: Place an Exploit token on any card.
Setup (requires Support): Gain 1 point for each of your Exploit tokens in a chosen line.
unwaveringIntegrator.flavorText: The Signal is truth. All else is noise.

signalProphet.name: Signal Prophet
signalProphet.ability:
Deploy: Place 1 Exploit token on each of your cards with Support in lines.
Commit (requires Support): Move one of your cards with an Exploit token 1 cell.
signalProphet.flavorText: The Signal is truth. All else is noise.

zealousMissionary.name: Zealous Missionary
zealousMissionary.ability:
Deploy: Place an Exploit token on any card.
Commit (requires Support): Give -1 power to a card with your Exploit token.
zealousMissionary.flavorText: The Signal is truth. All else is noise.

reverendOfTheChoir.name: Reverend of The Choir
reverendOfTheChoir.ability:
Setup (requires Support): Gain 1 point for each of your Exploit tokens on the battlefield.
Deploy: Double the number of Exploit tokens on any one card.
reverendOfTheChoir.flavorText: The hum of the servers is a hymn to the initiated.

overwatch.name: Overwatch
overwatch.ability:
● Place 1 Aim token on any card. Reveal 1 card from an opponent's hand for each of your Aim tokens on the battlefield.
● Place 1 Aim token on any card. Draw 1 card for each of your Aim tokens on the battlefield.

tacticalManeuver.name: Tactical Maneuver
tacticalManeuver.ability:
● Move one of your units to an empty cell in its line. Draw cards equal to that unit's power.
● Move one of your units to an empty cell in its line. Gain points equal to that unit's power.

inspiration.name: Inspiration
inspiration.ability:
● Remove any number of tokens from one of your units. Draw 1 card for each token removed.
● Remove any number of tokens from one of your units. Gain 1 point for each token removed.

dataInterception.name: Data Interception
dataInterception.ability:
● Place 1 Exploit token on any card. Reveal 1 card from an opponent's hand for each of your Exploit tokens on the battlefield.
● Place 1 Exploit token on any card. Move a unit with your Exploit token 1 or 2 cells.

falseOrders.name: False Orders
falseOrders.ability:
● Place 1 Exploit token on an opponent's card. Move that opponent unit with your Exploit token 1 or 2 cells. Reveal up to 2 cards from that opponent's hand.
● Place 1 Exploit token on an opponent's card. Move that opponent unit with your Exploit token 1 or 2 cells. Place 2 Stun tokens on it.

experimentalStimulants.name: Experimental Stimulants
experimentalStimulants.ability:
● A unit you control on the battlefield may activate its Deploy ability one additional time.
● Move one of your units to an empty cell in its line.

logisticsChain.name: Logistics Chain
logisticsChain.ability:
● Score points in a diagonal. Gain +1 point for each of your cards with Support in that diagonal.
● Score points in a diagonal. Draw 1 card for each of your cards with Support in that diagonal.

quickResponseTeam.name: Quick Response Team
quickResponseTeam.ability:
● Play a unit from your hand into an empty cell.
● Search your deck for a unit card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

temporaryShelter.name: Temporary Shelter
temporaryShelter.ability:
● Place 1 Shield token on one of your cards. Remove all Aim tokens from that card.
● Place 1 Shield token on one of your cards. Move that card 1 or 2 cells.

enhancedInterrogation.name: Enhanced Interrogation
enhancedInterrogation.ability:
● Place 1 Aim token on any card. Reveal 1 card from an opponent's hand for each of your Aim tokens on the battlefield.
● Place 1 Aim token on any card. Move any card with your Aim token 1 or 2 cells.

mobilization1.name: Line Breach
mobilization1.ability: Gain points in a chosen line of the battlefield.

abrGawain.name: ABR "Gawain"
abrGawain.ability:
Deploy: Gain a Shield token. Place an Aim token on a card in its line.
Setup: Destroy a card with your Aim token.

reclaimedGawain.name: Reclaimed "Gawain"
reclaimedGawain.ability:
Deploy: Gain a Shield token. Push an adjacent opponent card 1 cell; you may move into its former cell.
Setup: Destroy an adjacent opponent card with Threat or Stun.
reclaimedGawain.flavorText: Once a knight of the system, now a ghost in the machine.

secretInformant.name: Secret Informant
secretInformant.ability: Deploy: Look at the top 3 cards of any deck. Put any number of them on the bottom of that deck. Draw 1 card.

FalkPD.name: Michael Falk, Private Detective
FalkPD.ability:
Deploy: Find any card in your deck. Put it into your hand and shuffle.
Commit: Reveal 1 card from an opponent's hand.
FalkPD.flavorText: He finds things. Sometimes things that should stay lost.

edithByron.name: Edith Byron, Extreme Engineer
edithByron.ability:
Setup: Move to an empty cell in a line.
Deploy: Gain a Shield token. Create a Recon Drone token in an adjacent empty cell.
edithByron.flavorText: Building the future, one explosion at a time.

pinkunonekoSV.name: Pinkunoneko, Street Vigilante
pinkunonekoSV.ability:
Deploy: Place a Stun token on an adjacent opponent card.
Setup: Destroy an adjacent opponent card with Threat or Stun.
pinkunonekoSV.flavorText: Neon claws in the dark alley.

EleftheriaMD.name: Maria "Eleftheria" Damanaki
EleftheriaMD.ability:
Deploy: Place an Aim token on any card.
Setup: Destroy a card with your Aim token.
EleftheriaMD.flavorText: Freedom has a price. She collects it.

ziusIJ.name: Zius, Independent Journalist
ziusIJ.ability:
Deploy: Place an Exploit token on any card.
Setup (requires Support): Place an Exploit token on any card. Gain 1 point for each of your Exploit tokens in that card's line.
ziusIJ.flavorText: The truth is out there, and he's streaming it live.

reconDrone.name: Recon Drone
reconDrone.ability:
Setup: Move to any cell on the battlefield.
Commit: Choose an opponent card in an adjacent cell. Reveal 1 card from that opponent's hand.
reconDrone.flavorText: SynchroTech has created lightweight drones to patrol the streets, but the Hoods have other plans for them.

walkingTurret.name: Walking Turret
walkingTurret.ability:
Deploy: Place an Aim token on a card in its line.
Setup: Give -1 power to a card with an Aim token.
walkingTurret.flavorText: This military monster clearly has no place on the city streets.

Aim.name: Aim
Aim.description:
This counter has no effect on its own, but it can modify the abilities of cards.
This card is easier to destroy.

Exploit.name: Exploit
Exploit.description:
This counter has no effect on its own, but it can modify the abilities of cards.
Hacker and programmer cards will have a greater effect on this card.

LastPlayed.name: LastPlayed
LastPlayed.description: This card was last played by its owner.

Revealed.name: Revealed
Revealed.description: This card's face is visible to the owner of the counter revealed. Can be placed on cards in hand.

Stun.name: Stun
Stun.description:
A stunned card cannot activate abilities or gain points. Its owner's effects cannot move it, but opponent effects can.
Remove 1 stun counter from the card after the Scoring Phase.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: If an effect attempts to destroy this card, remove 1 shield counter from it instead.

Support.name: Support
Support.description:
This counter has no effect on its own, but it can modify the abilities of cards.
This card is adjacent to its ally.

Threat.name: Threat
Threat.description:
This counter has no effect on its own, but it can modify the abilities of cards.
This card is surrounded and pinned to the edge of the battlefield by an opponent's cards.

Resurrected.name: Resurrected
Resurrected.description: This unit recently returned from the discard pile. It will become Stunned at the start of the next phase.

Power+.name: Power+
Power+.description: Increases the power of the card by 1.

Power-.name: Power-
Power-.description: Decreases the power of the card by 1.
